nodes.text: The Ultra-Lift 3000 Extreme was a turbolift model for sale during the Galactic Civil War. It could fit at least one Human adult and was available for purchasing. The model was considered as an option by the Galactic Empire during the construction of the DS-1 Orbital Battle Station for replacing the Death Star's slower default lift tube. It was faster than the NB200 Commercial Lift and the Insta-Lift 2000 SE but slower than the Infini-lift Lightspeed.
